SELECT
    pgp.iram_publisher_id            AS partner_id,
    pgp.iram_publishergroup_id       AS group_id,
    pgp.doe                          AS date_added_to_group,
    pgp.uoe                          AS added_by_user_id
FROM iram_publishergroup_publisher pgp
JOIN iram_publishergroup pg
    ON pg.id = pgp.iram_publishergroup_id
WHERE pg.ircm_campaign_id = 4222
  AND pg.id = 95351
  AND pgp.iram_publisher_id IN (
    98480, 116792, 119570, 121977, 170970, 183789, 200614, 206792, 214970,
    225040, 229435, 233116, 244269, 247130, 273964, 314265, 366244, 377692,
    389834, 393244, 393377, 396274, 396282, 396303, 396341, 396510, 396989,
    397120, 398605, 399175, 399424, 402468, 408712, 410193, 415920, 417064,
    461292, 486396, 1139466, 1139994, 1142954, 1197091, 1203271, 1209731,
    1218759, 1228435, 1229167, 1231765, 1235848, 1245934, 1247630, 1252522,
    1257000, 1260561, 1283262, 1284633, 1285742, 1302594, 1306384, 1309882,
    1310453, 1322143, 1329139, 1330694, 1340294, 1341725, 1341801, 1351994,
    1371619, 1383012, 1402805, 1409583, 1420830, 1422727, 1425647, 1437276,
    1440844, 1444864, 1454261, 1457752, 1459171, 1804527, 1813511, 1943907,
    1978184, 1987062, 1987239, 2010732, 2030744, 2031599, 2037330, 2051410,
    2056022, 2061559, 2070295, 2097697, 2100700, 2154224, 2235859, 2244202,
    2258226, 2258306, 2275288, 2300474, 2314553, 2324003, 2336719, 2367855,
    2400123, 2445172, 2587710, 2669430, 2710752, 2754075, 2908443, 2946755,
    2973069, 2995644, 2997237, 2998108, 3094475, 3160591, 3184016, 3184099,
    3266139, 3275677, 3319435, 3430231, 3465954, 3476091, 3479755, 3491259,
    3496670, 3514337, 3541420, 3551746, 3583873, 3600799, 3608618, 3632098,
    3635479, 3675093, 3706011, 3778366, 3936150, 4015997, 4044629, 4061861,
    4069852, 4172555, 4196413, 4205306, 4212842, 4268398, 4308754, 4482076,
    4517411, 4538203, 4645896, 4677877, 4867310, 4895345, 5018789, 5134610,
    5162893, 5399445, 5434785, 5451111, 5522047, 5565583, 5571860, 5587163,
    5591357, 5610093, 5672819, 5726121, 5728598, 5743079, 5793438, 5813620,
    5820880, 5844890, 5986497, 6024718, 6062068, 6063818, 6067242, 6083378,
    6088923, 6096032, 6098142, 6100739, 6101334, 6118336, 6129000, 6131582,
    6141009, 6142508, 6148869, 6149636, 6149706, 6151243
  )
ORDER BY pgp.doe DESC;
